ayah: حمٓ
ayah_translit: ha-meem
ayah_english: Ha Meem

ayah: وَٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: wal-kitabi al-mubini
ayah_english: By the Book the clear

ayah: وَٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: wal-kitabi al-mubini
ayah_english: By the Book the clear

ayah: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: inna ja'alnahu qur'anan arabiyyan la'allakum ta'qiluna
ayah_english: Indeed We have made it a Quran (in) Arabic so that you may understand

ayah: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِيٓ أُمِّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِيٌّ حَكِيمٌ
ayah_translit: wa-innahu fi ummi al-kitabi ladayna la'aliyyun hakimun
ayah_english: And indeed it (is) in (the) Mother (of) the Book with Us surely exalted full of wisdom

ayah: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ
ayah_translit: afanadribu ankumu al-dhik'ra safhan an kuntum qawman mus'rifina
ayah_english: Then should We take away from you the Reminder disregarding (you) because you (are) a people transgressing

ayah: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: wakam arsalna min nabiyyin fi al-awalina
ayah_english: And how many We sent of a Prophet among the former (people)

ayah: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: wama yatihim min nabiyyin illa kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: And not came to them any Prophet any Prophet but they used (to) mock at him mock at him

ayah: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-ahlakna ashadda min'hum batshan wamada mathalu al-awalina
ayah_english: Then We destroyed stronger than them (in) power and has passed (the) example (of) the former (people)

ayah: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna khalaqahunna al-'azizu al-'alimu
ayah_english: And if you ask them Who created the heavens and the earth They will surely say Has created them the All-Mighty the All-Knower

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna khalaqahunna al-'azizu al-'alimu
ayah_english: And if you ask them Who created the heavens and the earth They will surely say Has created them the All-Mighty the All-Knower

ayah: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-arda mahdan waja'ala lakum fiha subulan la'allakum tahtaduna
ayah_english: The One Who made for you the earth a bed and made for you therein roads so that you may be guided

ayah: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَنشَرۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhi nazzala mina al-samai maan biqadarin fa-ansharna bihi baldatan maytan kadhalika tukh'rajuna
ayah_english: And the One Who sends down from the sky water in (due) measure then We revive with it a land dead thus you will be brought forth

ayah: وَٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءَۢ بِقَدَرٖ فَأَنشَرۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخۡرَجُونَ

ayah: وَٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مَا تَرۡكَبُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhi khalaqa al-azwaja kullaha waja'ala lakum mina al-ful'ki wal-an'ami ma tarkabuna
ayah_english: And the One Who created the pairs all of them and made for you [of] the ships and the cattle what you ride

ayah: وَٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مَا تَرۡكَبُونَ

ayah_english: And the One Who created the pairs all of them and made for you [of] the ships and the cattle what you ride

ayah: لِتَسۡتَوُۥاْ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِۦ ثُمَّ تَذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ رَبِّكُمۡ إِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَتَقُولُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُۥ مُقۡرِنِينَ
ayah_translit: litastawu ala zuhurihi thumma tadhkuru ni'mata rabbikum idha is'tawaytum alayhi wataqulu sub'hana alladhi sakhara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muq'rinina
ayah_english: That you may sit firmly on their backs then remember (the) favor (of) your Lord when you sit firmly on them and say Glory be (to) the One Who has subjected to us this and not we were of it capable

ayah: لِتَسۡتَوُۥاْ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِۦ ثُمَّ تَذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ رَبِّكُمۡ إِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَتَقُولُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُۥ مُقۡرِنِينَ

ayah: لِتَسۡتَوُۥاْ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِۦ ثُمَّ تَذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَةَ رَبِّكُمۡ إِذَا ٱسۡتَوَيۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَتَقُولُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُۥ مُقۡرِنِينَ
ayah_translit: litastawu ala zuhurihi thumma tadhkuru ni'mata rabbikum idha is'tawaytum alayhi wataqulu sub'hana alladhi sakhara lana hadha wama kunna lahu muq'rinina
ayah_english: That you may sit firmly on their backs then remember (the) favor (of) your Lord when you sit firmly on them and say Glory be (to) the One Who has subjected to us this and not we were of it capable

ayah: وَإِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنقَلِبُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-inna ila rabbina lamunqalibuna
ayah_english: And indeed we to our Lord will surely return

ayah: وَجَعَلُواْ لَهُۥ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ جُزۡءًاۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَكَفُورٞ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_translit: waja'alu lahu min ibadihi juz'an inna al-insana lakafurun mubinun
ayah_english: But they attribute to Him from His slaves a portion Indeed man surely (is) clearly ungrateful surely (is) clearly ungrateful

ayah: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ
ayah_translit: ami ittakhadha mimma yakhluqu banatin wa-asfakum bil-banina
ayah_english: Or has He taken of what He has created daughters and He has chosen (for) you sons

ayah: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِمَا ضَرَبَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مَثَلٗا ظَلَّ وَجۡهُهُۥ مُسۡوَدّٗا وَهُوَ كَظِيمٌ
ayah_translit: wa-idha bushira ahaduhum bima daraba lilrrahmani mathalan zalla wajhuhu mus'waddan wahuwa kazimun
ayah_english: And when is given good news (to) one of them of what he sets up for the Most Gracious (as) a likeness becomes his face dark and he (is) filled with grief

ayah: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُاْ فِي ٱلۡحِلۡيَةِ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡخِصَامِ غَيۡرُ مُبِينٖ
ayah_translit: awaman yunasha-u fi al-hil'yati wahuwa fi al-khisami ghayru mubinin
ayah_english: Then (is one) who is brought up in ornaments and he in the dispute (is) not clear

ayah: وَجَعَلُواْ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عِبَٰدُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ إِنَٰثًاۚ أَشَهِدُواْ خَلۡقَهُمۡۚ سَتُكۡتَبُ شَهَٰدَتُهُمۡ وَيُسۡـَٔلُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alu al-malaikata alladhina hum ibadu al-rahmani inathan ashahidu khalqahum satuk'tabu shahadatuhum wayus'aluna
ayah_english: And they made the Angels those who themselves (are) slaves (of) the Most Gracious females Did they witness their creation Will be recorded their testimony and they will be questioned

ayah: وَجَعَلُواْ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عِبَٰدُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ إِنَٰثًاۚ أَشَهِدُواْ خَلۡقَهُمۡۚ سَتُكۡتَبُ شَهَٰدَتُهُمۡ وَيُسۡـَٔلُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alu al-malaikata alladhina hum ibadu al-rahmani inathan ashahidu khalqahum satuk'tabu shahadatuhum wayus'aluna
ayah_english: And they made the Angels those who themselves (are) slaves (of) the Most Gracious females Did they witness their creation Will be recorded their testimony and they will be questioned

ayah: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ شَآءَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مَا عَبَدۡنَٰهُمۗ مَّا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُصُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu law shaa al-rahmanu ma abadnahum ma lahum bidhalika min il'min in hum illa yakhrusuna
ayah_english: And they say If had willed the Most Gracious (we would) not have worshiped them Not they have about that any knowledge Nothing they (do) but lie

ayah: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ
ayah_translit: am ataynahum kitaban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikuna
ayah_english: Or have We given them a book before it before it so they to it (are) holding fast

ayah: بَلۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: bal qalu inna wajadna abaana ala ummatin wa-inna ala atharihim muh'taduna
ayah_english: Nay they say Indeed we [we] found our forefathers upon a religion and indeed we on their footsteps (are) guided

ayah: بَلۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

ayah_translit: bal qalu inna wajadna abaana ala ummatin wa-inna ala atharihim muh'taduna
ayah_english: Nay they say Indeed we [we] found our forefathers upon a religion and indeed we on their footsteps (are) guided

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم مُّقۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: wakadhalika ma arsalna min qablika fi qaryatin min nadhirin illa qala mut'rafuha inna wajadna abaana ala ummatin wa-inna ala atharihim muq'taduna
ayah_english: And thus not We sent before you before you in a town any warner except said (the) wealthy ones of it Indeed, we [we] found our forefathers on a religion and indeed, we [on] their footsteps (are) following

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم مُّقۡتَدُونَ

ayah_translit: wakadhalika ma arsalna min qablika fi qaryatin min nadhirin illa qala mut'rafuha inna wajadna abaana ala ummatin wa-inna ala atharihim muq'taduna
ayah_english: And thus not We sent before you before you in a town any warner except said (the) wealthy ones of it Indeed, we [we] found our forefathers on a religion and indeed, we [on] their footsteps (are) following

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ فِي قَرۡيَةٖ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم مُّقۡتَدُونَ

ayah_english: And thus not We sent before you before you in a town any warner except said (the) wealthy ones of it Indeed, we [we] found our forefathers on a religion and indeed, we [on] their footsteps (are) following

ayah: ۞قَٰلَ أَوَلَوۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِأَهۡدَىٰ مِمَّا وَجَدتُّمۡ عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَكُمۡۖ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرۡسِلۡتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: qala awalaw ji'tukum bi-ahda mimma wajadttum alayhi abaakum qalu inna bima ur'sil'tum bihi kafiruna
ayah_english: He said Even if I brought you better guidance than what you found on it your forefathers They said Indeed we with what you are sent with [it] (are) disbelievers

ayah_english: He said Even if I brought you better guidance than what you found on it your forefathers They said Indeed we with what you are sent with [it] (are) disbelievers

ayah: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-intaqamna min'hum fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-mukadhibina
ayah_english: So We took retribution from them Then see how was (the) end (of) the deniers

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّنِي بَرَآءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡبُدُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idh qala ib'rahimu li-abihi waqawmihi innani baraon mimma ta'buduna
ayah_english: And when Ibrahim said Ibrahim said to his father and his people Indeed, I (am) disassociated from what you worship

ayah: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي فَإِنَّهُۥ سَيَهۡدِينِ
ayah_translit: illa alladhi fatarani fa-innahu sayahdini
ayah_english: Except the One Who created me and indeed He will guide me

ayah: وَجَعَلَهَا كَلِمَةَۢ بَاقِيَةٗ فِي عَقِبِهِۦ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: waja'alaha kalimatan baqiyatan fi aqibihi la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: And he made it a word lasting among his descendents so that they may return

ayah: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَرَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: bal matta'tu haulai waabaahum hatta jaahumu al-haqu warasulun mubinun
ayah_english: Nay I gave enjoyment (to) these and their forefathers until came to them the truth and a Messenger clear

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: walamma jaahumu al-haqu qalu hadha sih'run wa-inna bihi kafiruna
ayah_english: And when came to them the truth they said This (is) magic and indeed we of it (are) disbelievers

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: walamma jaahumu al-haqu qalu hadha sih'run wa-inna bihi kafiruna
ayah_english: And when came to them the truth they said This (is) magic and indeed we of it (are) disbelievers

ayah: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ
ayah_translit: waqalu lawla nuzzila hadha al-qur'anu ala rajulin mina al-qaryatayni azimin
ayah_english: And they say Why not was sent down this the Quran to a man from the two towns great

ayah: أَهُمۡ يَقۡسِمُونَ رَحۡمَتَ رَبِّكَۚ نَحۡنُ قَسَمۡنَا بَيۡنَهُم مَّعِيشَتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَرَفَعۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ فَوۡقَ بَعۡضٖ دَرَجَٰتٖ لِّيَتَّخِذَ بَعۡضُهُم بَعۡضٗا سُخۡرِيّٗاۗ وَرَحۡمَتُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّا يَجۡمَعُونَ
ayah_translit: ahum yaqsimuna rahmata rabbika nahnu qasamna baynahum ma'ishatahum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya warafa'na ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajatin liyattakhidha ba'duhum ba'dan sukh'riyyan warahmatu rabbika khayrun mimma yajma'una
ayah_english: Do they distribute (the) Mercy (of) your Lord We [We] distribute among them their livelihood in the life (of) the world and We raise some of them above others (in) degrees so that may take some of them others (for) service But (the) Mercy (of) your Lord (is) better than what they accumulate

ayah: أَهُمۡ يَقۡسِمُونَ رَحۡمَتَ رَبِّكَۚ نَحۡنُ قَسَمۡنَا بَيۡنَهُم مَّعِيشَتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَرَفَعۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ فَوۡقَ بَعۡضٖ دَرَجَٰتٖ لِّيَتَّخِذَ بَعۡضُهُم بَعۡضٗا سُخۡرِيّٗاۗ وَرَحۡمَتُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞ مِّمَّا يَجۡمَعُونَ

ayah_translit: ahum yaqsimuna rahmata rabbika nahnu qasamna baynahum ma'ishatahum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya warafa'na ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajatin liyattakhidha ba'duhum ba'dan sukh'riyyan warahmatu rabbika khayrun mimma yajma'una

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ لَّجَعَلۡنَا لِمَن يَكۡفُرُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمۡ سُقُفٗا مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيۡهَا يَظۡهَرُونَ
ayah_translit: walawla an yakuna al-nasu ummatan wahidatan laja'alna liman yakfuru bil-rahmani libuyutihim suqufan min fiddatin wama'arija alayha yazharuna
ayah_english: And if not that (would) become [the] mankind a community one We (would have) made for (one) who disbelieves in the Most Gracious for their houses roofs of silver and stairways upon which they mount

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ لَّجَعَلۡنَا لِمَن يَكۡفُرُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمۡ سُقُفٗا مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيۡهَا يَظۡهَرُونَ

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ لَّجَعَلۡنَا لِمَن يَكۡفُرُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمۡ سُقُفٗا مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيۡهَا يَظۡهَرُونَ

ayah_english: And if not that (would) become [the] mankind a community one We (would have) made for (one) who disbelieves in the Most Gracious for their houses roofs of silver and stairways upon which they mount

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ لَّجَعَلۡنَا لِمَن يَكۡفُرُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمۡ سُقُفٗا مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيۡهَا يَظۡهَرُونَ

ayah: وَلِبُيُوتِهِمۡ أَبۡوَٰبٗا وَسُرُرًا عَلَيۡهَا يَتَّكِـُٔونَ
ayah_translit: walibuyutihim abwaban wasururan alayha yattakiuna
ayah_english: And for their houses doors and couches upon which they recline

ayah: وَلِبُيُوتِهِمۡ أَبۡوَٰبٗا وَسُرُرًا عَلَيۡهَا يَتَّكِـُٔونَ

ayah: وَزُخۡرُفٗاۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: wazukh'rufan wa-in kullu dhalika lamma mata'u al-hayati al-dun'ya wal-akhiratu inda rabbika lil'muttaqina
ayah_english: And ornaments of gold And not (is) all that but an enjoyment (of) the life (of) the world And the Hereafter with your Lord (is) for the righteous

ayah: وَزُخۡرُفٗاۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

ayah: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ
ayah_translit: waman ya'shu an dhik'ri al-rahmani nuqayyid lahu shaytanan fahuwa lahu qarinun
ayah_english: And whoever turns away from (the) remembrance (of) the Most Gracious We appoint for him a devil then he (is) to him a companion

ayah: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ

ayah: وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-innahum layasuddunahum ani al-sabili wayahsabuna annahum muh'taduna
ayah_english: And indeed they surely turn them away from the Path and they think that they (are) guided

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَنَا قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَ بُعۡدَ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقَيۡنِ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرِينُ
ayah_translit: hatta idha jaana qala yalayta bayni wabaynaka bu'da al-mashriqayni fabi'sa al-qarinu
ayah_english: Until when he comes to Us he says O would that between me and between you (were the) distance (of) the East and the West How wretched is the companion!

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَنَا قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَ بُعۡدَ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقَيۡنِ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرِينُ

ayah: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِذ ظَّلَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: walan yanfa'akumu al-yawma idh zalamtum annakum fi al-'adhabi mush'tarikuna
ayah_english: And will never benefit you the Day when you have wronged that you (will be) in the punishment sharing

ayah: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: afa-anta tus'mi'u al-suma aw tahdi al-'um'ya waman kana fi dalalin mubinin
ayah_english: Then can you cause to hear the deaf or guide the blind and (one) who is in an error clear

ayah: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

ayah: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-imma nadhhabanna bika fa-inna min'hum muntaqimuna
ayah_english: And whether We take you away We take you away then indeed, We from them (will) take retribution

ayah: أَوۡ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِي وَعَدۡنَٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّا عَلَيۡهِم مُّقۡتَدِرُونَ
ayah_translit: aw nuriyannaka alladhi wa'adnahum fa-inna alayhim muq'tadiruna
ayah_english: Or We show you that which We have promised them then indeed We over them have full power

ayah: فَٱسۡتَمۡسِكۡ بِٱلَّذِيٓ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayah_translit: fa-is'tamsik bi-alladhi uhiya ilayka innaka ala siratin mus'taqimin
ayah_english: So hold fast to that which is revealed to you Indeed you (are) on a Path Straight

ayah: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'aluna
ayah_english: And indeed it (is) surely a Reminder for you and your people and soon you will be questioned

ayah: وَسۡـَٔلۡ مَنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلۡنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ءَالِهَةٗ يُعۡبَدُونَ
ayah_translit: wasal man arsalna min qablika min rusulina aja'alna min duni al-rahmani alihatan yu'baduna
ayah_english: And ask (those) whom We sent before you before you of Our Messengers did We make besides besides the Most Gracious gods to be worshipped

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَقَالَ إِنِّي رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna musa biayatina ila fir'awna wamala-ihi faqala inni rasulu rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: And certainly We sent Musa with Our Signs to Firaun and his chiefs and he said Indeed I am a Messenger (of the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَقَالَ إِنِّي رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaahum biayatina idha hum min'ha yadhakuna
ayah_english: But when he came to them with Our Signs behold! They at them laughed

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

ayah: وَمَا نُرِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٍ إِلَّا هِيَ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ أُخۡتِهَاۖ وَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayah_translit: wama nurihim min ayatin illa hiya akbaru min ukh'tiha wa-akhadhnahum bil-'adhabi la'allahum yarji'una
ayah_english: And not We showed them of a Sign but it (was) greater than its sister and We seized them with the punishment so that they may return

ayah: وَقَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهۡتَدُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu yaayyuha al-sahiru ud'u lana rabbaka bima ahida indaka innana lamuh'taduna
ayah_english: And they said O [the] magician! Invoke for us your Lord by what He has made covenant with you Indeed we (will) surely be guided

ayah: وَقَالُواْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهۡتَدُونَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma kashafna anhumu al-'adhaba idha hum yankuthuna
ayah_english: But when We removed from them the punishment behold! They broke (their word)

ayah: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

ayah: وَنَادَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فِي قَوۡمِهِۦ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَلَيۡسَ لِي مُلۡكُ مِصۡرَ وَهَٰذِهِ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِيٓۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wanada fir'awnu fi qawmihi qala yaqawmi alaysa li mul'ku mis'ra wahadhihi al-anharu tajri min tahti afala tub'siruna
ayah_english: And called out Firaun among his people he said O my people Is not for me (the) kingdom (of) Egypt and these [the] rivers flowing underneath me underneath me Then do not you see

ayah_translit: am ana khayrun min hadha alladhi huwa mahinun wala yakadu yubinu

ayah: فَلَوۡلَآ أُلۡقِيَ عَلَيۡهِ أَسۡوِرَةٞ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوۡ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ مُقۡتَرِنِينَ
ayah_translit: falawla ul'qiya alayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jaa ma'ahu al-malaikatu muq'tarinina
ayah_english: Then why not are placed on him bracelets of gold or come with him the Angels accompanying (him)

ayah: فَٱسۡتَخَفَّ قَوۡمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-ata'uhu innahum kanu qawman fasiqina
ayah_english: So he bluffed his people and they obeyed him Indeed they were a people defiantly disobedient

ayah: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma asafuna intaqamna min'hum fa-aghraqnahum ajma'ina
ayah_english: So when they angered Us We took retribution from them and We drowned them all

ayah: ۞وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدُّونَ
ayah_translit: walamma duriba ub'nu maryama mathalan idha qawmuka min'hu yasidduna
ayah_english: And when is presented (the) son (of) Maryam (as) an example behold! Your people about it laughed aloud

ayah: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَأَٰلِهَتُنَا خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ هُوَۚ مَا ضَرَبُوهُ لَكَ إِلَّا جَدَلَۢاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٌ خَصِمُونَ
ayah_translit: waqalu aalihatuna khayrun am huwa ma darabuhu laka illa jadalan bal hum qawmun khasimuna
ayah_english: And they said Are our gods better or he Not they present it to you except (for) argument Nay they (are) a people argumentative

ayah: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا عَبۡدٌ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَثَلٗا لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_translit: in huwa illa abdun an'amna alayhi waja'alnahu mathalan libani is'raila
ayah_english: Not he (was) except a slave We bestowed Our favor on him and We made him an example for (the) Children of Israel for (the) Children of Israel

ayah: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا عَبۡدٌ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَثَلٗا لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ

ayah: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَـٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ
ayah_translit: walaw nashau laja'alna minkum malaikatan fi al-ardi yakhlufuna
ayah_english: And if We willed surely We (could have) made among you Angels in the earth succeeding

ayah: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَعِلۡمٞ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمۡتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَٱتَّبِعُونِۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
ayah_translit: wa-innahu la'il'mun lilssa'ati fala tamtarunna biha wa-ittabi'uni hadha siratun mus'taqimun
ayah_english: And indeed it surely (is) a knowledge of the Hour So (do) not (be) doubtful about it and follow Me This (is the) Path Straight

ayah: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: wala yasuddannakumu al-shaytanu innahu lakum aduwwun mubinun
ayah_english: And (let) not avert you the Shaitaan Indeed he (is) for you an enemy clear

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ عِيسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ قَالَ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِٱلۡحِكۡمَةِ وَلِأُبَيِّنَ لَكُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي تَخۡتَلِفُونَ فِيهِۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
ayah_translit: walamma jaa isa bil-bayinati qala qad ji'tukum bil-hik'mati wali-ubayyina lakum ba'da alladhi takhtalifuna fihi fa-ittaqu al-laha wa-ati'uni
ayah_english: And when came Isa with clear proofs he said Verily I have come to you with wisdom and that I make clear to you some (of) that which you differ in it So fear Allah and obey me

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ عِيسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ قَالَ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِٱلۡحِكۡمَةِ وَلِأُبَيِّنَ لَكُم بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي تَخۡتَلِفُونَ فِيهِۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
ayah_translit: inna al-laha huwa rabbi warabbukum fa-u'buduhu hadha siratun mus'taqimun
ayah_english: Indeed Allah He (is) my Lord and your Lord so worship Him This (is) a Path Straight

ayah: فَٱخۡتَلَفَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِهِمۡۖ فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayah_translit: fa-ikh'talafa al-ahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lilladhina zalamu min adhabi yawmin alimin
ayah_english: But differed the factions from among them so woe to those who wronged from (the) punishment (of the) Day painful

ayah: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
ayah_translit: hal yanzuruna illa al-sa'ata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
ayah_english: Are they waiting except (for) the Hour that it should come on them suddenly while they (do) not perceive

ayah: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: al-akhilau yawma-idhin ba'duhum liba'din aduwwun illa al-mutaqina
ayah_english: Friends that Day some of them to others (will be) enemies except the righteous

ayah_translit: ya'ibadi la khawfun alaykumu al-yawma wala antum tahzanuna
ayah_english: O My slaves! No fear on you this Day and not you will grieve

ayah_translit: alladhina amanu biayatina wakanu mus'limina

ayah_translit: ud'khulu al-janata antum wa-azwajukum tuh'baruna

ayah: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِصِحَافٖ مِّن ذَهَبٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيهِ ٱلۡأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنُۖ وَأَنتُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: yutafu alayhim bisihafin min dhahabin wa-akwabin wafiha ma tashtahihi al-anfusu wataladhu al-a'yunu wa-antum fiha khaliduna
ayah_english: Will be circulated for them plates of gold and cups And therein (is) what desires the souls and delights the eyes and you therein will abide forever

ayah: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِصِحَافٖ مِّن ذَهَبٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيهِ ٱلۡأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنُۖ وَأَنتُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: yutafu alayhim bisihafin min dhahabin wa-akwabin wafiha ma tashtahihi al-anfusu wataladhu al-a'yunu wa-antum fiha khaliduna
ayah_english: Will be circulated for them plates of gold and cups And therein (is) what desires the souls and delights the eyes and you therein will abide forever

ayah: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: watil'ka al-janatu allati urith'tumuha bima kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: And this (is) the Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used (to) do

ayah: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
ayah_translit: lakum fiha fakihatun kathiratun min'ha takuluna
ayah_english: For you therein (are) fruits abundant from it you will eat

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: inna al-muj'rimina fi adhabi jahannama khaliduna
ayah_english: Indeed the criminals (will be) in (the) punishment (of) Hell abiding forever

ayah_translit: la yufattaru anhum wahum fihi mub'lisuna
ayah_english: Not will it subside for them and they in it (will) despair

ayah: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَنَادَوۡاْ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقۡضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّـٰكِثُونَ
ayah_translit: wanadaw yamaliku liyaqdi alayna rabbuka qala innakum makithuna
ayah_english: And they will call O Malik! Let put an end to us your Lord He (will) say Indeed you (will) remain

ayah: لَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَكُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ
ayah_translit: laqad ji'nakum bil-haqi walakinna aktharakum lil'haqqi karihuna
ayah_english: Certainly We have brought you the truth but most of you to the truth (are) averse

ayah_translit: am abramu amran fa-inna mub'rimuna
ayah_english: Or have they determined an affair Then indeed We (are) determined

ayah: أَمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّا لَا نَسۡمَعُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَرُسُلُنَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ
ayah_translit: am yahsabuna anna la nasma'u sirrahum wanajwahum bala warusuluna ladayhim yaktubuna
ayah_english: Or (do) they think that We (can) not hear their secret(s) and their private counsel(s) Nay and Our Messengers with them are recording

ayah: أَمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّا لَا نَسۡمَعُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَرُسُلُنَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ

ayah: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَلَدٞ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡعَٰبِدِينَ
ayah_translit: qul in kana lilrrahmani waladun fa-ana awwalu al-'abidina
ayah_english: Say If had the Most Gracious a son Then I (would be the) first (of) the worshippers

ayah: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayah_translit: sub'hana rabbi al-samawati wal-ardi rabbi al-'arshi amma yasifuna
ayah_english: Glory be (to the) Lord (of) the heavens and the earth (the) Lord (of) the Throne above what they ascribe

ayah: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
ayah_translit: fadharhum yakhudu wayal'abu hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi yu'aduna
ayah_english: So leave them (to) converse vainly and play until they meet their Day which they are promised

ayah: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi fi al-samai ilahun wafi al-ardi ilahun wahuwa al-hakimu al-'alimu
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who (is) in the heaven God and in the earth God And He (is) the All-Wise the All-Knower

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

ayah: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: watabaraka alladhi lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma wa'indahu il'mu al-sa'ati wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And blessed is the One Who to Whom (belongs the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between both of them and with Him (is the) knowledge (of) the Hour and to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: watabaraka alladhi lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma wa'indahu il'mu al-sa'ati wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And blessed is the One Who to Whom (belongs the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between both of them and with Him (is the) knowledge (of) the Hour and to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

ayah_translit: watabaraka alladhi lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma wa'indahu il'mu al-sa'ati wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And blessed is the One Who to Whom (belongs the) dominion (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between both of them and with Him (is the) knowledge (of) the Hour and to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَلَا يَمۡلِكُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَن شَهِدَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: wala yamliku alladhina yad'una min dunihi al-shafa'ata illa man shahida bil-haqi wahum ya'lamuna
ayah_english: And not have power those whom they invoke besides Him besides Him (for) the intercession except who testifies to the truth and they know

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqulunna al-lahu fa-anna yu'fakuna
ayah_english: And if you ask them who created them they will certainly say Allah Then how are they deluded

ayah: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

ayah: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: waqilihi yarabbi inna haulai qawmun la yu'minuna
ayah_english: And his saying O my Lord! Indeed these (are) a people (who do) not believe

ayah_translit: waqilihi yarabbi inna haulai qawmun la yu'minuna
ayah_english: And his saying O my Lord! Indeed these (are) a people (who do) not believe

ayah: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-is'fah anhum waqul salamun fasawfa ya'lamuna
ayah_english: So turn away from them and say Peace But soon they will know

ayah: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
